name: com.caseyfarina.eventgametoolkit
description: Educational Unity toolkit for Animation and Interactivity class. Provides modular, no-code components using UnityEvents for creating interactive experiences. Includes systems for input detection, spawning, health, timers, physics, dialogue, decal animation, and more.

samples.description: Pre-configured example scenes demonstrating each system (Physics, Health, Timers, etc.)
